lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Pralinés à l'Ancienne - 27 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
Our Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" are produced ‘old fashioned-style’. These classics, with almonds and hazelnuts caramelised come in fondant and crunchy varieties. Recipes containing pistachios, peanuts or roasted coconut marry tradition and originality. 
This box of 27 pieces contains 9 flavours.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Pépites box - 36 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: This box contains 36 Pépites - small chocolate bites - exploring 6 flavors. In addition to the unmissable Caramel Hazelnut ones, the Manufacture offers you to discover new recipes.Try the chocolaty intensity of the Cocoa Nibs Pépite, the character of the Kenyan coffee Pépite, the roundness of the Walnut Pépite or the crunchy Buckwheat Pépite.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Discovery Box - 30 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of La Manufacture’s chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes...
This box of 30 pieces contains 25 flavours.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Pralinés à l'Ancienne - 39 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
Our Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" are produced ‘old fashioned-style’. With 4 additional flavors, the box gets larger for pralinés lovers!
To the classic recipes with almond, hazelnut, pistachio, peanut, coconut in dark or milk chocolate... are added sunflower, cocoa nibs, white & black sesame flavors. A combination of tradition & originality!

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Discovery Box - 21 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of La Manufacture’s chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes and an array of textures that tempt the palate into answering the call of indulgence...
This box of 21 pieces contains 21 flavours.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Pépites Box - 16 pieces  - Dark
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: This box contains 16 luscious "pépites" - small dark chocolate bites. Inside each of them: our famous "old-style" hazelnut praliné, a small dose of caramel and crunchy crushed hazelnuts. A treasure for praline lovers !

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Pépites Box - 16 pieces - Milk
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: This box contains 16 luscious "pépites" - small milk chocolate bites. Inside each of them : our famous "old-style" hazelnut praliné, a small dose of caramel and crunchy crushed hazelnuts. A treasure for praline lovers !

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Discovery Box - 12 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of La Manufacture’s chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes and an array of textures that tempt the palate into answering the call of indulgence...

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Double-bites Box - 4 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The Manufacture declines its delicious ganaches and its old-fashioned pralines in an even more delectable format. Double bites are now available in a small introductory box containing 4 bites/4 flavours.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Single-Origin Ganaches
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
The origins of the cocoa are key to discovering the Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, it is the terroir of each country or, more precisely, of each region that gives the beans their individual taste. The Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches come in 5 varieties, like an invitation to as many gustatory destinations around the world.
This box of 30 pieces contains 5 flavours.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Flavored Ganaches
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
The Flavored Ganaches come in 11 flavours offering different textures: fondant, crunchy and crispy. Created using fresh fruit or spices, the Flavored Ganaches offer both original and creative blends. 
This box of 21 pieces contains 11 flavours.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Flavored Ganaches & Single-Origin Ganaches
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: A selection of 54 bonbons to discover the Flavored Ganaches and Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Single-Origin Ganaches & Pralinés à l'Ancienne
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: A selection of 60 bonbons to discover the Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches and Pralinés "à l'Ancienne".

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Small Essentials Box
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Our Soveria candied fruits, roc's, and dragées are gathered in one box! This box of Essentials contains milk chocolate roc's, Soveria Candied Oranges and milk chocolate hazelnut dragées.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Large Essentials Box
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Our Soveria candied fruits, roc's, and dragées are gathered in one box! This box of Essentials contains milk & dark chocolate roc's, Soveria Candied Oranges, milk chocolate hazelnut dragées, dark chocolate almond dragées.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Square Bites Box - 30 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The square bites box invites you to discover 3 of our origins : Ecuador 85%, Congo 75% and Milk Peru 45%. The small squares decorated with our signature beveled shapes will take you on an exploratory voyage through the flavors and finesse of our terroirs. To enjoy on their own, accompanied by a coffee, or discover in a blind test with connoisseurs.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Square Bites Box - 50 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The square bites box invites you to discover 5 origins. The small squares decorated with our signature beveled shapes will take you on an exploratory voyage through the flavors of our terroirs. To enjoy on their own with coffee, or to discover as a blind test with friends.Discover these square bites : 85% Ecuador, 75% Congo, 75% Brasil, 55% Milk Madagascar, 45% Milk Peru.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Flavored Ganaches & Pralinés à l'Ancienne
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: A selection of 51 bonbons to discover the Flavored Ganaches and Pralinés "à l'Ancienne".

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Discovery Box - 45 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of La Manufacture’s chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes and an array of textures that tempt the palate into answering the call of indulgence...

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Discovery Box - 58 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of La Manufacture’s chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes and an array of textures that tempt the palate into answering the call of indulgence...
This box of 58 pieces contains 25 flavours.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Discovery Box - 90 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of La Manufacture’s chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes and an array of textures that tempt the palate into answering the call of indulgence...

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: 6 chocolate bars Box
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
From the grand cru to the single-origin bar, not to mention the Mendiant and the unconched Tradition bar, this set of chocolate bars is an invitation to the sweet world of La Manufacture.6 chocolate bars: 45% Peru Milk, 75% Almonds, Candied Oranges & Figs, 75% Rustic Peru, 85% Ecuador, 75% Mexico, 75% Madagascar Criollo & Trinitario.*

*The bars' list may vary from onoe origin to another depending on availibility.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Cocorico Box 16 Pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
Did you know? In Latin, the word "gallus" means both "Gaul" and "rooster"! Historically, the rooster appeared on Gaulish coins — today, it appears on our treats!
In collaboration with the Élysée - Presidency of the Republic brand, Chocolat Alain Ducasse pays tribute to the French symbol and includes the word "Cocorico" inscribed on its pépites.
These indulgent treats conceal a dual-praliné heart: hazelnut praline & almond nib praliné for the dark chocolate version, and almond praliné & hazelnut vanilla praliné for the milk chocolate.
Proceeds contribute to the funding of the renovation of the Élysée Palace, helping to enhance this historic monument and open it to the French population, 300 years after its construction.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Triumph Bar
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
To triumph during this historic sporting event, our Paris Manufacture transforms the Iron Lady into chocolate for victory! To help her cross the finish line, the 75% dark chocolate Triumph Bar is adorned with french hazelnuts and almonds, carefully selected by our chef. Whether as a gift or a treat for yourself, this crunchy, delicious recipe promises an exquisite tasting experience!
Taste this ode to French know-how that crowns the efforts of our craftsmen.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Praliné Triumph Hexagon
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: With its medal-like shape, the Praliné Triumph Hexagon transports you to this french based sporting event. Containing a treasure trove of French pistachio and almond praliné, it invites you to take part in this very special moment. If you want to reach the end and win the chocolate laurels, dare to enjoy it! Whether as a gift or for yourself, this 45% Milk Chocolate creation from our Manufacture promises a tasting experience full of flavor.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Rustic Peru
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A bar of dark chocolate made with beans originating from Peru. Not having undergone the conching stage,  making it closer to that of the bean.
The Signature chocolate bars are the combination of a taste with a unique identity, discover recipes revealing the raw and pure character of our selected beans.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Extra Dark
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A refined and powerful dark chocolate, without added sugar, the pure flavour of cocoa beans originating from Peru, South America.
The Signature chocolate bars are the combination of a taste with a unique identity, discover recipes revealing the raw and pure character of our selected beans.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: The Blend
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
The Manufacture invites you to discover its blend, a perfect balance between 4 crus cocoa beans - Peru, Ecuador, Madagascar, Sao Tome - for a unique signature chocolate bar!
The Signature chocolate bars are the combination of a taste with a unique identity, discover recipes revealing the raw and pure character of our selected beans.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Sugar-free
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
To indulge without guilt, La Manufacture offers a sugar-free dark chocolate bar with 85% cocoa 
The Signature chocolate bars are the combination of a taste with a unique identity, discover recipes revealing the raw and pure character of our selected beans.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Rustic Madagascar
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A bar of milk chocolate, with beans originating from Madagascar, Indian Ocean. Not having undergone the conching stage,  making it closer to that of the bean.
The Signature chocolate bars are the combination of a taste with a unique identity, discover recipes revealing the raw and pure character of our selected beans.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Coconut Milk
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Discover this brand-new recipe of La Manufacture, 100% vegan and made with coconut milk & Cameroon cocoa beans, a sweet delight!

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Triumph Bar
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
To triumph during this historic sporting event, our Paris Manufacture transforms the Iron Lady into chocolate for victory! To help her cross the finish line, the 45% milk chocolate Triumph Bar is adorned with french hazelnuts and almonds, carefully selected by our chef. Whether as a gift or a treat for yourself, this crunchy, delicious recipe promises an exquisite tasting experience!
Taste this ode to French know-how that crowns the efforts of our craftsmen.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Chopped Pistachios
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A dark chocolate bar with 75% cocoa covered with chopped pistachios
The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Caramelised hazelnut
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A dark chocolate bar with 75% cocoa covered in whole, caramelised hazelnuts
The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Caramelised almonds
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A dark chocolate bar with 75% cocoa covered in whole, caramelised almonds
The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Almonds & candied oranges & figs
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A dark chocolate bar with 75% cocoa covered in whole, caramelised almonds, pistachios, pine nuts, morsels of figs and candied orange
The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Caramelised almonds
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A dark chocolate bar with 75% cocoa covered in whole, caramelised almonds
The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Almonds & candied oranges & figs
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A milk chocolate bar covered in whole, caramelised almonds, pistachios, pine nuts, morsels of figs and candied orange
The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Chopped Pistachios
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A milk chocolate bar covered in whole, chopped pistachios 
The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Nougatine & fleur de sel
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A bar of dark chocolate encrusted with almond brittle, and a touch of fleur de sel.
The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Nougatine & fleur de sel
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A bar of milk chocolate dotted with almond brittle and seasoned with a salty note from the hint of fleur de sel
The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Caremelised hazelnut
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A milk chocolate bar covered in whole, caramelised hazelnuts
The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Ecuador National Arriba
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
With a 5,000-year-old genetic lineage, Ecuador’s famous heirloom cocoa - Nacional - from the Finca Garyth farm embodies centuries of cocoa tradition.
A true single-origin “grand cru”, it is a complex blend of wild tropical flavours, fresh almonds, a vegetal undertone and banana in the finish.
The Single-Origin bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans from diverse provenances.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Madagascar Mivoatra
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Cru d'Exception among our range of chocolate bars, this chocolate from Madagascar presents strong and musky flavours. Raw and acidulous notes emerge during tasting. From the cocoa bean to the chocolate bar, including roasting and conching, all the production stages are carried out in our factory. With a range of different origins, our Cru d'Exception chocolate bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Tanzanie
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Cru d'Exception among our range of chocolate bars, this chocolate from Tanzania presents bright and fruity notes. Notes of citrus, acidulous and fresh, emerge during tasting. From the cocoa bean to the chocolate bar, including roasting and conching, all the production stages are carried out in our factory. With a range of different origins, our Cru d'Exception chocolate bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Vietnam
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A rugged and slightly acidic dark chocolate, made with beans originating from Vietnam, Asia
The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Philippines Trinitario
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
Grown in the tropical region of Davao, at Paquibato in Southeastern Philippines, this cocoa is a balanced blend of fruity and sour notes. A true single-origin "grand cru", it gathers the flavors of tropical fruits, berries, citrus and of roasted nuts.
The Single-Origin bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans from diverse provenances.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Peru Chuncho
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Colombie Criollo
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Cru d'Exception from Latin America, this dark chocolate comes from Colombian Criollo beans. With its 75% cocoa, this dark chocolate presents soft and balanced notes. With a palette of different origins, our Cru d'Exception chocolate bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Venezuela Chuao
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
Grand cru cocoa beans: a delicate dark chocolate of an exceptional variety, beans originating from Chuao, a small village of Venezuela
The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Madagascar Criollo & Trinitario
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
This rare cocoa from Northwestern Madagascar grows in the canopy of the Ottange farm under the shade of native trees. A true single-origin “grand cru”, this dark chocolate is a subtle bouquet of notes of red fruits, nuts, honey, coffee and cocoa.
The Single-Origin bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans from diverse provenances.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Mexico Criollo & Almendra Blanca
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A true single-origin "grand cru", this chocolate from Mexico - the origin country of cocoa is made from Criollo & Almendra Blanca beans of the Tacotalpa region. Nurtured by the warmth and humidity of the country, they offer an abundance of citrus and tonic notes and reveal a discreet bitterness.
The Single-Origin bars explore the original taste of cocoa beans from diverse provenances.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Sao Tome & Principe Amelonado
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
Grand cru cocoa beans: São Tomé cacao originates from the first importations of chocolate in to Africa. This traditional pure product is from an Amelonado variety. Its distinctive features include aromas of dried fruits.
The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Brazil Forastero Blanco
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
Grand cru: « Forastero Blanco », also known as « Catongo », carries red fruit flavours. 
The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Togo
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Delicate and flavored, this grand cru is the first from Togo to be processed by the Manufacture's roasting chocolate craftsmen. Thanks to its high cocoa content, this bar combines the sweetness of milk chocolate with the intensity of cocoa.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Madagascar
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A tart milk chocolate made with beans originating from Madagascar, Indian Ocean.
The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Madagascar
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A tart milk chocolate, traditionally balanced, made with beans originating from Madagascar, Indian Ocean
The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Peru
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A milk chocolate, traditionally balanced, made with beans originating from Peru, South America
The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Madagascar
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A very milky and sweet milk chocolate, made with beans originating from Madagascar
The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Praliné Triumph Hexagone
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: With its medal-like shape, the Praliné Triumph Hexagon transports you to this french based sporting event. Containing a treasure trove of French pistachio and almond praliné, it invites you to take part in this very special moment. If you want to reach the end and win the chocolate laurels, dare to enjoy it! Whether as a gift or for yourself, this 75% Dark Chocolate creation from our Manufacture promises a tasting experience full of flavor.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Coconut Praliné
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
The coconut praliné from the Manufacture is entering the range of filled bars for the happiness of the most gourmands!
This 75% Signature Blend dark chocolate bar is filled with two preparations made by our chocolate craftsmen. First a praliné with roasted coconut and almonds, then a caramel, also with coconut. The crunchiness of the praliné and the smoothness of the caramel combined to the crisp of the chocolate layers create a delicious game of textures, for a great moment of indulgence.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Hazelnut praliné & fleur de sel
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A bar of dark chocolate filled with an old-style hazelnut praliné, with a pinch of fleur de sel to intensify the flavour
Filled chocolate bars require patient and meticulous work. The chocolate is first poured in a thin layer. The filling is then delicately placed onto the poured chocolate, which is then layered with melted chocolate. The result is a delicious bar...

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Hazelnut praliné & fleur de sel
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A bar of milk chocolate filled with a traditional hazelnut praliné and seasoned with a salty note from the hint of fleur de sel. Try it now, it's unmissable!
Filled chocolate bars require patient and meticulous work. The chocolate is first poured in a thin layer. The filling is then delicately placed onto the poured chocolate, which is then layered with melted chocolate. The result is a delicious bar with a praliné, marzipan, ganache or fruit centre for crunchy, crispy or fondant centres.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Pistachio praliné
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: A bar of dark chocolate filled with old-style crunchy praliné with pistachios. Filled chocolate bars require patient and meticulous work. The chocolate is first poured in a thin layer. The filling is then delicately placed onto the poured chocolate, which is then layered with melted chocolate. The result is a delicious bar with a praliné, marzipan, ganache or fruit centre for crunchy, crispy or fondant centres.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Pistachio-flavoured Marzipan
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A bar of dark chocolate filled with pistachio-flavoured marzipan
Filled chocolate bars require patient and meticulous work. The chocolate is first poured in a thin layer. The filling is then delicately placed onto the poured chocolate, which is then layered with melted chocolate. The result is a delicious bar with a praliné, marzipan, ganache or fruit centre for crunchy, crispy or fondant centres.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: French Hexagon Praliné
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
For the Elysée, we created with Pierre Tachon, the French Hexa. A tribute to France’s shape, it invites you to share the values of the Republic. Coated in dark chocolate, it is filled with a French hazelnuts praliné. 
All the profits go towards restoration projects of The Elysée, 300 hundred years after it was built, and contribute to the preservation of cultural and historical patrimony.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: French Hexagon Praliné
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
For the Elysée, we created with Pierre Tachon, the French Hexa. A tribute to France’s shape, it invites you to share the values of the Republic. Coated in milk chocolate, it is filled with a French hazelnuts praliné. 
All the profits go towards restoration projects of The Elysée, 300 hundred years after it was built, and contribute to the preservation of cultural and historical patrimony.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: French Hexagon Mendiant
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
For the Elysée, we created with Pierre Tachon, the French Hexa. A tribute to France’s shape, it invites you to share the values of the Republic. Coated in dark chocolate, it is garnished with French dried fruts and nuts.
All the profits go towards restoration projects of The Elysée, 300 hundred years after it was built, and contribute to the preservation of cultural & historical patrimony.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: French Nuts & Candied fruits
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse imagined a new patriotic creation following the Hexa-français. Proudly displaying the french nation motto on one side, it pays tribute to the french terroir on the other. Decorated with nuts & candied fruits all from France, its tasting offers a variety of flavors and textures. For the Dark version, the Manufacture selected the Signature Blend 75% for its beautiful aromatic intensity and its slightly fruity notes.All the profits go towards restoration projects of the Elysée Palace, 300 hundred years after it was built, and contribute to the preservation of cultural and historical patrimony.A creation by Pierre Tachon

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: French Nuts & Candied Fruits
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Le Chocolat Alain Ducasse imagined a new patriotic creation following the Hexa-français. Proudly displaying the french nation motto on one side, it pays tribute to the french terroir on the other. Decorated with nuts & candied fruits all from France, its tasting offers a variety of flavors and textures. For the Milk version, the Manufacture selected the Single Origin Madagascar Trinitario 45%, very mild with red fruit notes, slightly tart.All the profits go towards restoration projects of the Elysée Palace, 300 hundred years after it was built, and contribute to the preservation of cultural and historical patrimony.A creation by Pierre Tachon

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Giant Chocolate bars
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The dark chocolate produced by La Manufacture is available in XXL format! This one kilo breakable block is to be savoured as it comes or to offer as an original present in a novel form. This artisanal chocolate, with its unique flavour, can also be used in the preparation of desserts.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Square Bites Box - 30 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The square bites box invites you to discover 3 of our origins : Ecuador 85%, Congo 75% and Milk Peru 45%. The small squares decorated with our signature beveled shapes will take you on an exploratory voyage through the flavors and finesse of our terroirs. To enjoy on their own, accompanied by a coffee, or discover in a blind test with connoisseurs.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Square Bites Box - 50 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The square bites box invites you to discover 5 origins. The small squares decorated with our signature beveled shapes will take you on an exploratory voyage through the flavors of our terroirs. To enjoy on their own with coffee, or to discover as a blind test with friends.Discover these square bites : 85% Ecuador, 75% Congo, 75% Brasil, 55% Milk Madagascar, 45% Milk Peru.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Peanut Bar
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The Manufacture Alain Ducasse has created a resolutely generous gift for Father's Day that will remind dads of their childhood years! This new recipe is a dark chocolate bar filled with hazelnut almond praline and drizzled with caramel and peanut slivers. Gourmet chocolate lovers will be thrilled!

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: 6 chocolate bars Box
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
From the grand cru to the single-origin bar, not to mention the Mendiant and the unconched Tradition bar, this set of chocolate bars is an invitation to the sweet world of La Manufacture.6 chocolate bars: 45% Peru Milk, 75% Almonds, Candied Oranges & Figs, 75% Rustic Peru, 85% Ecuador, 75% Mexico, 75% Madagascar Criollo & Trinitario.*

*The bars' list may vary from onoe origin to another depending on availibility.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Cocoa Pods Bar
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Our Christmas Milk chocolate bar, featuring a unique blend highlighting various cocoa origins will take you back to the source of chocolate. Indulge in our chocolate bar adorned with cocoa pods, a true symbol of our foundational ingredient.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Java
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A smoky dark chocolate beans originating from the Island of Java, Indonesia.
The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources. With a range of different origins and as many refined flavours, our bars reveal the personality of their producing country and terroir.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Bolivia Wild Cocoa
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
Harvested by native populations in the northern forest of Bolivia, this wild cocoa reveals a sweet smell and is characterized by a non-acidic freshness and a particularly varied palette of aromas: dried fruits, flowers and spices.
The Single-Origin bars explore the purity and diversity of various sources.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Smooth Caramel
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
Coated in dark chocolate, this chocolate bar is filled with a smooth caramel that melts in the mouth and crunchy almond flakes, a blend of flavours and textures that will awaken your senses.
The perfect sweet treat !

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Smooth Caramel
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Coated in milk chocolate, this chocolate bar is filled with a smooth caramel that melts in the mouth and crunchy almond flakes, a blend of flavours and textures that will awaken your senses. The perfect sweet treat !

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Petit Coq
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
In collaboration with the Élysée - Presidency of the Republic brand, Chocolat Alain Ducasse pays homage to the famous French symbol by creating the Little Rooster.
This indulgent creation is filled with sweetness, featuring a smooth blend of hazelnut and French almond praliné mixed with our dark or milk chocolate blends.
Proceeds contribute to the funding of the renovation of the Élysée Palace, helping to enhance this historic monument and open it to the French population, 300 years after its construction.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Little Rooster
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
In collaboration with the Élysée - Presidency of the Republic brand, Chocolat Alain Ducasse pays homage to the famous French symbol by creating the Little Rooster.
This indulgent creation is filled with sweetness, featuring a smooth blend of hazelnut and French almond praliné mixed with our dark or milk chocolate blends.
Proceeds contribute to the funding of the renovation of the Élysée Palace, helping to enhance this historic monument and open it to the French population, 300 years after its construction.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: French Hexagon Mendiant
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
For the Elysée, we created with Pierre Tachon, the French Hexa. A tribute to France’s shape, it invites you to share the values of the Republic. Coated in milk chocolate, it is garnished with French dried fruts and nuts.
All the profits go towards restoration projects of The Elysée, 300 hundred years after it was built, and contribute to the preservation of cultural & historical patrimony.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Giant Chocolate bars
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The dark chocolate produced by La Manufacture is available in XXL format! This one kilo breakable block is to be savoured as it comes or to offer as an original present in a novel form. This artisanal chocolate, with its unique flavour, can also be used in the preparation of desserts.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Hazelnut Chocolate spread XL
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Deliciously regressive, spreadable chocolate...Created from an almond and hazelnut praline, dark chocolate and milk chocolate, this spread will put a smile on the faces of children and grown-ups alike. Similarly to the Manufacture’s old-fashioned pralines, the spread has a slightly granulose texture making it unique and ultra- delicious.XL size 550g

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Hazelnut Chocolate spread
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: A childish delight, chocolate spread... Made with caramelised almonds and hazelnuts pralines, dark chocolate and milk chocolate, this spread will delight young and old alike. Like the traditional caramelised nut praliné made by La Manufacture, this spread has a delicately crunchy texture that makes it truly original as well as truly delicious.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Hot Chocolate mix
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: A taste of childhood... A comforting brew whose smell is rich with memories, perfect for breakfast or an afternoon snack. How do you make a real cup of traditional hot chocolate? Pour a little warm milk over the grated chocolate to melt it, mixing well until it is smooth. Then add more warm milk, until the desired chocolaty consistency and strength is reached. 300g

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Chocobar - Dark
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Generous proportions, geometric shapes that have become the Manufacture de chocolate signature, a delicious recipe and a re-sealable pouch... the chocolate bar is THE perfect treat to carry with you anywhere, in your pocket, to indulge anytime, anywhere... The "mendiant" style bar reveals a heart made with almond and hazelnut praline, slivers of pistachios, raisins and candied orange peel...

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Chocobar - Milk
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Generous proportions, geometric shapes that have become the Manufacture de chocolat signature, a delicious recipe and a re-sealable pouch... the perfect treat to carry with you anywhere, in your pocket, to indulge anytime, anywhere... The "mendiant" style bar reveals a heart made with almond and cornflake praline combined with a caramel ganache, covered in Madagascar 45% milk chocolate.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Sesame Chocobar
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
Generous proportions, geometric shapes that have become the Manufacture's signature, a delicious recipe in a re-sealable pouch... the chocobar is THE perfect treat to carry in your pocket, to indulge anytime, anywhere...
The bar reveals a heart made with black sesame and almond praline, puffed rice for the crispy, all coated in dark chocolate...

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Chocolate Bars  - Milk
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
In dark chocolate praline or milk chocolate.
Individual bars of chocolate to enjoy on the go or slipped into a piece of bread. This compact and practical box is easily transportable, for an impromptu snack, a picnic, at the office, traveling... 20 individually wrapped bars - 240 g

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Chocolate Bars  - Dark Praliné
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
In dark chocolate praline or milk chocolate.
Individual bars of chocolate to enjoy on the go or slipped into a piece of bread. This compact and practical box is easily transportable, for an impromptu snack, a picnic, at the office, traveling... 20 individually wrapped bars - 240 g

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Square Bites Box - 30 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The square bites box invites you to discover 3 of our origins : Ecuador 85%, Congo 75% and Milk Peru 45%. The small squares decorated with our signature beveled shapes will take you on an exploratory voyage through the flavors and finesse of our terroirs. To enjoy on their own, accompanied by a coffee, or discover in a blind test with connoisseurs.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Square Bites Box - 50 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The square bites box invites you to discover 5 origins. The small squares decorated with our signature beveled shapes will take you on an exploratory voyage through the flavors of our terroirs. To enjoy on their own with coffee, or to discover as a blind test with friends.Discover these square bites : 85% Ecuador, 75% Congo, 75% Brasil, 55% Milk Madagascar, 45% Milk Peru.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Peanut Chocolate Spread
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Our chocolate spreads are the perfect childish delight... This original recipe, made from peanuts & hazelnuts pralines, dark & milk chocolate, will delight young and old alike. The spread offers a meltingly soft texture that makes it truly delicious.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Soveria candied Citrus trio
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: It is in Soveria, a small village in Corsica, that craftsmen manufacture oranges, lemons, grapefruit and ginger. After a night's rest they are then individually cut, before being coated with cocoa powder, with the exception of candied ginger.  The final step exalts their natural flavours: a thin coating of dark chocolate... For a very delicious and delectable result.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Small Essentials Box
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Our Soveria candied fruits, roc's, and dragées are gathered in one box! This box of Essentials contains milk chocolate roc's, Soveria Candied Oranges and milk chocolate hazelnut dragées.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Large Essentials Box
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Our Soveria candied fruits, roc's, and dragées are gathered in one box! This box of Essentials contains milk & dark chocolate roc's, Soveria Candied Oranges, milk chocolate hazelnut dragées, dark chocolate almond dragées.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Square Bites Box - 30 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The square bites box invites you to discover 3 of our origins : Ecuador 85%, Congo 75% and Milk Peru 45%. The small squares decorated with our signature beveled shapes will take you on an exploratory voyage through the flavors and finesse of our terroirs. To enjoy on their own, accompanied by a coffee, or discover in a blind test with connoisseurs.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Croc'
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Revisit your childhood with our Croc'. These puffed cereals are carefully coated in dark or milk chocolate, creating a crunchy texture that melts deliciously in the mouth. Our Croc' is the perfect snack or afternoon treat!

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Roc's  - Hazelnut
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: A “Roc” is delicious and highly addictive: a blend of dried and candied fruits, puffed cereals and shavings of lace crêpes all coated in either dark or milk chocolate. Unique combinations, high-quality ingredients and an artisanal savoir-faire that results in no two Roc’s having the same shape, but all having a delicious taste that is constant!

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Dragées - Hazelnut
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Dragées perpetuate the long-standing, classic recipe of caramelised dry fruit coated in chocolate. They are available in both dark and milk chocolate: almond and hazelnut.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Dragées - Hazelnut
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Dragées perpetuate the long-standing, classic recipe of caramelised dry fruit coated in chocolate. They are available in both dark and milk chocolate: almond and hazelnut.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Dragées - Almond
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Dragées perpetuate the long-standing, classic recipe of caramelised dry fruit coated in chocolate. They are available in both dark and milk chocolate: almond and hazelnut.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Dragées - Almond
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Dragées perpetuate the long-standing, classic recipe of caramelised dry fruit coated in chocolate. They are available in both dark and milk chocolate: almond and hazelnut.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Square Bites Box - 50 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The square bites box invites you to discover 5 origins. The small squares decorated with our signature beveled shapes will take you on an exploratory voyage through the flavors of our terroirs. To enjoy on their own with coffee, or to discover as a blind test with friends.Discover these square bites : 85% Ecuador, 75% Congo, 75% Brasil, 55% Milk Madagascar, 45% Milk Peru.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Soveria candied Oranges
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: It is in Soveria, a small village in Corsica, that craftsmen manufacture oranges, lemons, grapefruit and ginger. After a night's rest they are then individually cut, before being coated with cocoa powder, with the exception of candied ginger.  The final step exalts their natural flavours: a thin coating of dark chocolate... For a very delicious and delectable result.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Soveria candied Ginger
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: It is in Soveria, a small village in Corsica, that craftsmen manufacture oranges, lemons, grapefruit and ginger. After a night's rest they are then individually cut, before being coated with cocoa powder, with the exception of candied ginger.  The final step exalts their natural flavours: a thin coating of dark chocolate... For a very delicious and delectable result.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Pralinés à l'Ancienne - 27 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
Our Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" are produced ‘old fashioned-style’. These classics, with almonds and hazelnuts caramelised come in fondant and crunchy varieties. Recipes containing pistachios, peanuts or roasted coconut marry tradition and originality. 
This box of 27 pieces contains 9 flavours.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Pépites box - 36 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: This box contains 36 Pépites - small chocolate bites - exploring 6 flavors. In addition to the unmissable Caramel Hazelnut ones, the Manufacture offers you to discover new recipes.Try the chocolaty intensity of the Cocoa Nibs Pépite, the character of the Kenyan coffee Pépite, the roundness of the Walnut Pépite or the crunchy Buckwheat Pépite.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Peanut Bar
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The Manufacture Alain Ducasse has created a resolutely generous gift for Father's Day that will remind dads of their childhood years! This new recipe is a dark chocolate bar filled with hazelnut almond praline and drizzled with caramel and peanut slivers. Gourmet chocolate lovers will be thrilled!

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Square Bites Box - 50 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The square bites box invites you to discover 5 origins. The small squares decorated with our signature beveled shapes will take you on an exploratory voyage through the flavors of our terroirs. To enjoy on their own with coffee, or to discover as a blind test with friends.Discover these square bites : 85% Ecuador, 75% Congo, 75% Brasil, 55% Milk Madagascar, 45% Milk Peru.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Large Essentials Box
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Our Soveria candied fruits, roc's, and dragées are gathered in one box! This box of Essentials contains milk & dark chocolate roc's, Soveria Candied Oranges, milk chocolate hazelnut dragées, dark chocolate almond dragées.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Single-Origin Ganaches
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
The origins of the cocoa are key to discovering the Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, it is the terroir of each country or, more precisely, of each region that gives the beans their individual taste. The Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches come in 5 varieties, like an invitation to as many gustatory destinations around the world.
This box of 30 pieces contains 5 flavours.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Flavored Ganaches
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
The Flavored Ganaches come in 11 flavours offering different textures: fondant, crunchy and crispy. Created using fresh fruit or spices, the Flavored Ganaches offer both original and creative blends. 
This box of 21 pieces contains 11 flavours.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Coconut Praliné
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
The coconut praliné from the Manufacture is entering the range of filled bars for the happiness of the most gourmands!
This 75% Signature Blend dark chocolate bar is filled with two preparations made by our chocolate craftsmen. First a praliné with roasted coconut and almonds, then a caramel, also with coconut. The crunchiness of the praliné and the smoothness of the caramel combined to the crisp of the chocolate layers create a delicious game of textures, for a great moment of indulgence.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Pépites Box - 16 pieces - Milk
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: This box contains 16 luscious "pépites" - small milk chocolate bites. Inside each of them : our famous "old-style" hazelnut praliné, a small dose of caramel and crunchy crushed hazelnuts. A treasure for praline lovers !

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Discovery Box - 21 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of La Manufacture’s chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes and an array of textures that tempt the palate into answering the call of indulgence...
This box of 21 pieces contains 21 flavours.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Caramelised almonds
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
A dark chocolate bar with 75% cocoa covered in whole, caramelised almonds
The Mendiant chocolate bar hark back to the classic recipe of the same name, containing dried fruit... or not! Crunchy bars of chocolate covered with luscious ingredients, candied fruits, caramelised hazelnuts or chopped pistachios.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Chocolate Bars  - Milk
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
In dark chocolate praline or milk chocolate.
Individual bars of chocolate to enjoy on the go or slipped into a piece of bread. This compact and practical box is easily transportable, for an impromptu snack, a picnic, at the office, traveling... 20 individually wrapped bars - 240 g

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Hazelnut Chocolate spread XL
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: Deliciously regressive, spreadable chocolate...Created from an almond and hazelnut praline, dark chocolate and milk chocolate, this spread will put a smile on the faces of children and grown-ups alike. Similarly to the Manufacture’s old-fashioned pralines, the spread has a slightly granulose texture making it unique and ultra- delicious.XL size 550g

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Triumph Bar
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
To triumph during this historic sporting event, our Paris Manufacture transforms the Iron Lady into chocolate for victory! To help her cross the finish line, the 75% dark chocolate Triumph Bar is adorned with french hazelnuts and almonds, carefully selected by our chef. Whether as a gift or a treat for yourself, this crunchy, delicious recipe promises an exquisite tasting experience!
Taste this ode to French know-how that crowns the efforts of our craftsmen.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Praliné Triumph Hexagon
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: With its medal-like shape, the Praliné Triumph Hexagon transports you to this french based sporting event. Containing a treasure trove of French pistachio and almond praliné, it invites you to take part in this very special moment. If you want to reach the end and win the chocolate laurels, dare to enjoy it! Whether as a gift or for yourself, this 45% Milk Chocolate creation from our Manufacture promises a tasting experience full of flavor.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Discovery Box - 45 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of La Manufacture’s chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes and an array of textures that tempt the palate into answering the call of indulgence...

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Praliné Cocoa Pod
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: At the genesis of artisanal chocolate making and a symbol of the profession of chocolatier-torréfacteur, our majestic cabosse in Choclat Noir 75% is dressed in gold leaf to illuminate your most beautiful festive tables. A true objet d'art, you'll find it hard to break. Yet beneath its chocolate shell lies a generous layer of praline grué.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: 6 chocolate bars Box
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
From the grand cru to the single-origin bar, not to mention the Mendiant and the unconched Tradition bar, this set of chocolate bars is an invitation to the sweet world of La Manufacture.6 chocolate bars: 45% Peru Milk, 75% Almonds, Candied Oranges & Figs, 75% Rustic Peru, 85% Ecuador, 75% Mexico, 75% Madagascar Criollo & Trinitario.*

*The bars' list may vary from onoe origin to another depending on availibility.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Discovery Box - 58 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of La Manufacture’s chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes and an array of textures that tempt the palate into answering the call of indulgence...
This box of 58 pieces contains 25 flavours.

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Discovery Box - 90 pieces
lechocolat_alainducasse.description: The Discovery box contains a delicious assortment of La Manufacture’s chocolates for those exploring the range for the first time, or for the amateur of variety. Single-Origin dark chocolate Ganaches, Pralinés "à l'Ancienne" and Flavored Ganaches... unique tastes and an array of textures that tempt the palate into answering the call of indulgence...

lechocolat_alainducasse.title: Double Chocolate Heart
lechocolat_alainducasse.description:
La Manufacture Alain Ducasse is set to melt hearts on Father's Day with its double chocolate creation. Dark chocolate or milk chocolate... Why choose? Our chocolatiers have crafted a heart that is half dark chocolate, our 75% Signature Blend (Ecuador, Sao Tomé, Madagascar, Peru) and half milk chocolate (45% Madagascar).
This deliciously tempting creation will make every father's heart melt, so make her day with this wonderful gift!
